law.catch_line: Conduct unbecoming an officer and a gentleman.
law.text: Any commissioned officer, cadet, candidate, or midshipman who is convicted of conduct unbecoming an officer and a gentleman shall be punished as a court-martial may direct.
law.history: Repealed, reenacted, renumbered, and amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 137, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 94, effective July 1, 1954.
